attributes.review:
This app is anything BUT great. 
Make the App Store great again by taking this horrendous use of code off of it please.
attributes.title: Holy guac, This app is anything BUT great.

attributes.review: This app is seriously the worst. When I downloaded the app, I saw a Cheeto puff with eyes and then threw up multiple times. My throw up ended up attracting billions of ants which ended up overrunning and kicking me out of my own house. While on the streets I befriended a beetle named Ferdinand. One night while I was sleeping Ferdinand stole the rest of my personal belongings and then literally stabbed me in the back. I walked to the nearest hospital with the knife still in my back, and the doctors said that I needed surgery to live. The surgery took two weeks and I ran out of vacation days so I got fired from my job. The surgery also put me in tremendous debt. Here I am two years later still homeless with a phone that cost me $30. 0/10 two thumbs down 😾
attributes.title: This app made me homeless

attributes.review: First off I saw an orange duck in front of a flag and I didn’t like that.Second I feel offended why do you need my phone number third I just didn’t like how it was forcing me to give my number and finally I just wasn’t working
attributes.title: Don’t

attributes.review: When I opened the app, I saw this orange monkey looking thing. Then I saw something that said “ tr...tru...trump🤢🤮” (sorry i could barely even say it, i’m not allowed to say bad words😑) Then my brother had a heart attack and we cant go to the hospital because of Corona Deshay Lavirus. We need somebody to pay the hospital bills. Ouu chile the ghetto 💅🏾.Also, we need justice. BLACK LIVES MATTER SIS. Trump 1946-2020 on a gravestone💗💗. Anyways love you guys 🧢🧢🧢🧢🧢
attributes.title: So Disrespectful

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and next thing I noticed i wanted to go to the bathroom, so I went to the bathroom and couldn’t poop, and then out of nowhere I pooped out a orange that said “Donald Trump” on it, and after that I could never poop again 😞 -1/10 dont recommend installing
attributes.title: My poop is gone

attributes.title: LOONA-So What lyrics(Hangul)

attributes.review: You open the app to see a offensive picture of a very terrible man.This app is basically propaganda.Its just like the news outlets and ads.They are all set up by the government to spread a opinion to make cultures,races,and etc. look bad or good.Would never recommend to install this app.Do not get your opinion changed by the influence of propaganda.
attributes.title: Horrific
